titleStmt.title: A bride-bush, or A vvedding sermon compendiously describing the duties of married persons: by performing whereof, marriage shall be to them a great helpe, which now finde it a little hell.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William Iaggard, for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the entrance into the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
